page.title: 12Leisure 2 Shobdon and Byton
page.content: The six most popular week-end activities {at home}were: 20 people gardening 12 people knitting 8 people reading 5 people watching television 5 people cooking 5 people resting The five most popular week-end activities{outside the home}were: 19 people "going out for a drive" 12 people visiting friends etc. 7 people "window shopping" 6 people "having a meal" 4 people "going for a drink" We also asked people{how far they {would travel}for entertainment: 23 people said " up to 5 miles " 13 people said " up to 10 miles " 7 people said " up to 15 miles " 10 people said " up to 20 miles " 25 people said " up to 30 miles "
